headline.0: Cooking Off the Cuff: With The Duck, I'll Have My Usual - A Negroni
headline.1: Missy Robbins Wins Cochon 555 New York 2013, Beats Out 5 Other Female Chefs

short_description.0: It seemed to me that its flavors - gin, Campari and Italian vermouth, plus a slice of orange as a garnish - lent themselves to sauce-making.
short_description.1: On Sunday, A Voce chef Missy Robbins won this year's Cochon 555 competition in New York. That's not so surprising: Robbins' refined yet earthy Italian cooking has already garnered praise from the Michelin Red Guide and President Obama alike.

authors.0:
Edward Schneider, Contributor
Travel, cooking and food writer
